players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Alice was found dead last night, so we need to be extra careful today. Let's share any suspicions or info we have to find the mafia quickly."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafia. I investigated him last night and can confirm his role. We need to vote him out now to keep the town safe."
Charlie: "Bob has stayed silent and hasn't denied my claim. That silence speaks volumes. We must vote him out now before he causes more harm."
You: "Sorry, I was just caught off guard. I'm innocent and want to help solve the case."

Diana: "Charlie’s claim sounds convincing, but we should consider all possibilities carefully. Bob’s silence earlier is suspicious, but it might also be shock. Let’s vote for Bob to protect the town."
